casebody.data:
Anitra L. FARRIOR, Vantoice F. Farrior, Yvette A. Farrior, Anaiah Hill, a minor appearing through her Guardian ad Litem, Ralph Wiley, and Anitra L. Farrior, Administratrix of the Estate of Kiaria Inesha Hill
v.
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY. No. 266P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Kenneth R. Massey, Rocky Mount, for Farrior et al. J. Darby Wood, Goldsboro, Sarah L. Heekin, for State Farm Mutual Auto Ins. Co.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd day of June 2004 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
